cause.description:
This is an organization that I'm putting into full swing this summer. I'm almost finished with the website, which will have a link to Save A Life teachers (with designs I drew) and the money will all go to veterinary hospitals, local (California) animal shelters, reservations, and other independant care facilities. I'll have a secified list of these soon.
1. Animals deserve better treatment
2. Too many species are becoming endangered
3. Animals are losing their habitats
cause.mission: help endangered, mistreated, and injured animals
cause.name: Save A Life
